item.title: GSoC Tales : Boss Fights & Journey To A New Land Named FITSIO.jl

item.description: Well, the best news to write about right now, would have been to say that I’ve completed transcribing the procedures for AstroLib.jl, my main objective for GSoC.Unfortunately, complications(read laziness) are a thing and with all the smaller monsters and minions killed (the already finished procedur ...READ MORE...

item.title: Has it been a month already?

item.title: It’s fine if the title says “Contributing to GSoC and open-source improves your coding skill”…

You start at Level 1 (or zilch) with some basic stats like ‘Agility’, ‘Strength’, ‘Healt ...READ MORE...

item.title: Google Summer of Code, OpenAstronomy Class of 2017
